radiographic_examinations.findings: Heterogeneous echotexture seen in the liver; fibrous cord replacing the middle hepatic vein; presence of mild ascites.

No contrast opacification in middle and left hepatic veins; partial opacification in the right hepatic vein; complete thrombosis of middle and left hepatic veins; partial thrombosis of the right hepatic vein; slight enlargement of caudate lobe; heterogeneous mottled appearance of the liver (nutmeg liver).
Confirmed imaging findings from previous studies.
